column3: Chandler, I saw what you were doing through the window
Chandler, I saw what you were doing to my sister
Listen, we had a good run
I mean, that's more than most people have in a lifetime
So, good-bye, take care, bye-bye then
Oh, I'm going on the lamb
Come on Chandler, come on, I can handle Ross
Well, I think, I think Ross knows about me and Monica
I thought you were my best friend, this is my sister
My best friend and my sister
Look, we're not just messing around
Okay, I'm in love with her
I'm so sorry that you had to find out this way
I'm sorry, but it's true, I love him too
My best friend and my sister
You guys probably wanna get some hugs in too, huh
Awww, no, it's okay, we've actually known for a while
You all knew and you didn't tell me
Well, Ross, we were worried about you
We didn't know how you were going to react
You didn't know how I was going to react
What do you say we all clear out of here and let these two lovebirds get back down to business
Hey-hey-hey, I-I-I'm just talking here, he-he's the one doing your sister
Hey, you know what I just realized
If you guys ever have kids…
Don't you think her brother should be Godfather
Sure, if you cared enough to call it first
Guys, you're a few steps ahead of us
Yeah, big zero gravity moon steps
Oh, I just thought of the greatest wedding gift to get you
Ooh, I'll go in on that with you
So, are you ready to go
Yeah, I just gotta run to the bathroom
Hey, where are we going to lunch
How did you know I love Chinese
You could fit her right in your little pocket
I mean I like her a lot, and she's really nice, but…
In that cute, little, sweet way she just did
Hey, it's a lot harder than it looks
I know what you need, you need a bodyguard
Hey Ross, what is Ben doing after preschool
Hey listen, come on, Joey is having a problem
A little girl is beating him up
Look honey, I know this must be really, really difficult for you and I--Oh, I'm sorry
I brought you some house warming gifts
Salt, so your life always has flavor
Bread, so you never go hungry
And a scented candle for the bathroom, because well, y'know
And this is my friend Phoebe
I came to talk to you about Howard
He's gonna be retiring next week and everyone who lives here is kicking in a 100 bucks as a thank you for all the hard work type of thing
So, do you want to give a check
Oh look, you don't have to give it too me right now
You can slip it under my door
No-no, it's not that, it's just… I-I just moved in
Well, the guy's worked here for 25 years
Yes, but I've lived here for 25 minutes
I'm sorry, it's just I've never even met Howard
I-I mean I don't know Howard
Yes but too me he's just, man
Ugh, can you believe that guy
…so then President Steve told everyone that I was a cheapskate, and now the whole building hates me
A little kid spit on my knee
For everyone in the building, and I'm gonna sit them down and explain to them, I am not a bad guy
I am not a cheap guy
I'm just a guy who-who stands up for what he believes in
Look, Ross, if you want your neighbors to like you, why don't you just pay the hundred bucks
The party's gonna cost you way more than that
Okay, I thought it was about your neighbors liking you
Once they come to my awesome PAR-TAY
I gotta go get some nametags
And that crazy party animal will be your brother-in-law
Very, very funny, but don't say things like that in front of Monica
I don't want you putting any ideas in her head
Umm, Chandler, you do realize that those ideas are probably already in Monica's head
Well, because she loves you and because you love her
Yeah, so, what's that supposed to mean
I'm telling you something you already know
Come on, she broke up with Richard because he didn't want to have babies
And she's a woman, and she's almost 30, and y'know it's Monica
I don't see it that way
Because, I see two Monicas, the one that was my friend, who lived across the hall, and wanted to have a lot of babies and then the new Monica, who I just started to date
Now, who's to say what she wants
No, you're right, you are absolutely right
I mean that makes, that makes everything different
It's not different at all, is it
Not unless different means the same
You were so funny with that waiter
Y'know, breadstick fangs are always funny
Uhh, look Katie, uh listen, we-we need to talk
I-I really do, I like you a lot
But sometimes when you, when you playfully punch me like that it-it feels like someone's hitting me with a very tiny but very real bat
Aww, like I could hurt you
Are you making fun of my size
Don't make fun of me because of my size
Couldn't you just stay like this forever
Couldn't you just stay here forever
Yeah, here, somewhere else, y'know where-where ever
Y'know with the girl that I'm seeing casually
I knew you were going to do this
Get all freaked out because everybody was talking and just joking around about marriage and stuff
Well, you do want all that stuff, right
Oh and you know what I want
I do not have baby fever
Oh please, you are obsessed with babies and-and marriage and everything that's related to babies and-and marriage
I've got an idea, why don't we turn down the heat on this pressure cooker
This is about you and all your weird relationship commitment crap
I know the thoughts that you have in the head--in your head
Did you know that I'm going out with Rachel tonight instead of you
And did you know that the only baby around here is you
And did you know that I can't even look at you right now
Well, I did not know that
I mean she's not gonna leave me
Well, unless you make some kind of big gesture
Gunther, can I get a coffee  to go
I'm still not done not wanting to talk to you
Just tell me what I need to do to make things right
Y'know, I-I mess up and then you tell me how to fix it and then I do and then y'know you think I'm all cute again
I'm really tired of being your relationship tutor
You're gonna have to figure this one for yourself
If you're too afraid to be in a real relationship, then don't be in one
Oh, I thought this was your party and it turns out it’s a party for Howard
He's just the sweetest little man
Oh and hey, thanks for chipping in
I can't believe you gave them money
I thought you agreed it was totally unreasonable that they asked me for that money
Yeah, but they didn't ask me
This way I'm just y'know, the exotic, generous stranger
Yeah, but you're making me look bad
If anything I'm making you look better
They'll see you talking to me and that's--I'm a hit
Umm, see, I was thinking maybe you two could switch apartments because Phoebe's more our kind of people
Hey listen, is it obvious that I'm wearing six sweaters
Well look, I’m breaking up with Katie so I had to put on some extra padding
I mean, if she hits me when she's happy, can you imagine how hard she's gonna hit me when I tell her I'm taking away the Joey love
Did Joey tell you to say that
I gotta tell ya I-I-I-I think you are the one who is too much
Ohh, Joey has the nicest friends
You'd better do something, or I'm gonna walk out that door right now
I'm talking you up to people
Just give it a little time, all right
So uh, what did you tell them about me
Oh, I was telling them about you and Emily
Y'know, try to get some sympathy
But somehow you came off as the bad guy
Yeah, I think I told it wrong
Y'know, we should talk about that because I don't totally understand what happened there
Ohh, this cake is really good
Who would do a think like that
Okay, you got your free food
Don't you think it's time you went home
I have something that I would like to say
Of course you don't like him
He-he didn't give you any money, he raised his own hand when I asked, "Who hear likes Ross," and he's wearing two nametags
I-I'll be honest with you guys, when I first met Ross I didn't like him at all
But then once I got to know him I saw that he's really sweet and caring and very generous
I mean, all I'm saying is don't judge Ross before you get to know him all right
I mean, I like all you guys now, but when I first meet you y'know Kurt, I thought, y'know abrasive drunk, umm Lola, mind numbingly stupid
And okay, you guys   Gold-digger,  cradle robbing perv
So, I think you all know what I mean
Obviously I didn't think they were gonna start throwing things
I just thought if I kept insulting everyone, you would jump in and defend everyone and then you could look like the hero
See, I did not get that
I need to talk to her
I need to talk to you, it's urgent
Okay, I've been doing a lot of thinking about us, y'know a lot of uhh, us thinking
And uh, well I guess there's only one-one way to do this
Ohhhh, I cannot look at it
Chandler, why are you doing this
But I know I'm not afraid to do this
I'm doing this because I'm sorry
Do you umm, you really think the best reason to get married is because you're sorry
No, the best reason to get married is pregnancy
Sorry is pretty much fourth y'know, behind being ready and actually wanting to get married
Chandler, umm, I want you to take just a minute and I want you to think about how ridiculous this sounds
Yeah, I'm kinda wishing everyone wasn't here right now
Do you know that none of that stuff came from me
I mean I never said I wanted to have babies and get married right now
Yeah I know, but I was really confused and then I talked to these guys
Y'know when I said that I want you to deal with this relationship stuff all on your own
Well, you're not ready for that
Oh my God, what would have done if I said yes
Well I would've been happy because I would've be able to spend the rest of my life with the woman that I love
Or, you would've seen a Chandler shaped hole in that door
Hey Ross, will you pass me that knife
You don't have to be so mean about it
Aw, and I was gonna ask you to marry me because I forgot to say hello to you last week
Oh no wait Pheebs, I think for something like that you just ask them to move in with you
Okay, how long is this going to go on
Well I think the length of teasing is directly related to how insane you were so, a long time
Hey Rach, remember that whole "We were on a break thing
" Well, I'm sorry, will you marry me
